He searched for doctors to help her

Isaac was sick

answers: Two nations are in you, the older will serve the younger
Your sons will always live in perfect peace
You're having triplets

questions.text: What were Rebekah’s two babies like?
answers: Esau was hairy; Jacob was born second, grabbing onto Esau’s heel
Jacob was born first, with Esau grabbing onto his heel
The twins were identical, no one could tell them apart
Esau was tall and thin, Jacob was short and chunky

questions.text: What were the boys like as they grew?
answers: Esau hunted, was dad’s favorite; Jacob stayed at home, was mom’s favorite
Both boys loved hunting and cooking and were always together
Jacob hunted while Esau stayed home and cooked
They never stopped wrestling each other
The firstborn son gets double of their father’s things after their father dies
A special blessing from a mother
A reward for doing chores around the house
The right to get to blow out your birthday candles

answers: Some of Jacob’s stew
A bag of gold
A brand new hunting bow
One million dollars

answers: The Lord God
An angel

answers: Stay in the land. God repeated the same promises he made to Abraham
